infos.value: Ugh! There are too many of them. At this rate...
Seems I made it just in time.
Who—!?
I-it's...Glaciela!
It's been a while, hasn't it, Mont?
Yes, it's been far too long.
You certainly seem to have grown since I last laid eyes on you. Did something happen?
A few things... Make that a few things too many.
In any case, I'm glad you made it to Wezette in one piece.
I knew I could count on Minwu to aid you.
I-is that so...?
Truly.
If you'd gone directly to Wezette, then right about now, you'd be—
Facing Wezette's soldiers?
To make sure that didn't come to pass, I sent Minwu.
What is going on here?
I heard tell of you attempting to usurp King Khury's throne.
Then you heard correctly. With this, everything is now in motion.
Mont... It all began the moment you visited Wezette.
The first step is dealing with «Equito»... Let's go.
